name: Fish Simulator (popcorn_studios1)
description:
HOW TO PLAY FISH SIMULATOR

BUY FISH WITH FISH TOKENS

a fish cost 1 fish token, collect 1 fish token for a chance of buying a fish, just press space

MOVE WITH DIRECTIONS

use the arrow keys to guide your fish player to wherever you want

BUILD YOUR OCEAN

you can buy as many fish as you want, making your own fish world!
